name: Lego obby
description:
if you want to play game that is lego ,and you want to play roblox obby/parkour  then this is the combination !! Game with Lego style and Obby ,do you like to parkour on minecraft ? here is the game ! i challenge you finish the level ,what all the level ? check it out and download the game !

if there some bugs or error report it  on comment ! 

this game is for windows, mac and, linux( but specialy for windows)
